factText: The smoke from the #holyfire is impacting our air quality. Smoke from the massive #HolyFire has descended on much of Riverside County. Due to smoke from the #HolyFire burning in the Cleveland National Forest, the South Coast Air Quality Management District - SCAQMD has issued a smoke advisory affecting Ontario. factText: New mandatory evacuations were ordered Thursday afternoon in Lake Elsinore for homes on the mountainside of Lake Street and southeast of Grand Avenue to Ortega Highway. ADDITIONAL VOLUNTARY EVACUATIONS ARE IN EFFECT  For areas of Horsethief and Glen Eden communities. Voluntary evacuation orders remain in place for Hwy 74 corridor, Horsethief Canyon and Glen Eden communities.

factText: The smoke from the #holyfire is impacting our air quality. Smoke from the massive #HolyFire has descended on much of Riverside County. Due to smoke from the #HolyFire burning in the Cleveland National Forest, the South Coast Air Quality Management District - SCAQMD has issued a smoke advisory affecting Ontario. Significant amounts of drift smoke from the #HolyFire are settling into our mountain communities with the strongest concentration over the #Crestline, #LakeArrowhead areas.

factText: #HOLYFIRE ROAD CLOSURE AND MANDATORY EVACUATIONS: Eastbound Ortega Highway (Highway 74) is closed. ROAD CLOSURE *UPDATE* (8:50AM) Trabuco Creek Rd. at Trabuco Canyon Rd. remains closed until further notice. SR-74 (Ortega Highway) is open and is currently not affected by the #holyfire. Caltrans ordered the complete closure of Ortega Highway because of the proximity of the brush fire to the two-lane corridor.

factText: Happening now: The Holy Fire is nearing a Southern California neighborhood. The Holy Fire made a downhill run toward the El Cariso and McVicker Park communities, leading authorities to call in air strikes to protect the residential areas, which abut federal land.

factText: #Holyfire mandatory evacuations include Sycamore Creek. This time-lapse video shows the Holy Fire spreading quickly in southern California. Evacuations have been ordered in the area. factText: AS many of you now know, mandatory evacuation notices are now in effect for certain areas, due to the #HolyFire. Police have arrested a man in connection with a Southern California wildfire that has burned 12 cabins and led to some evacuations. There are currently about 100 wildfires burning across the west, forcing tens of thousands of people to evacuate.

factText: 6200 acres; ONLY FIVE % contained (August 8, 2018; 15:00 PDT) #HOLYfire. As of 9:50 p.m., Thursday, August 9, the Holy Fire is at 10,236 Acres and 5% contained. A fast-moving wildfire fueled by thick, tinder- dry vegetation that hasn't burned in nearly four decades was 5 percent contained tonight after charring 3,399 acres in the Holy Jim Canyon area. •••• •••• ••••• •••• ••••  UPDATE 6:25 p.m., August 11, 2018: The Holy fire has grown to over 21,000 acres and his 29% contained.
